hero.title: Bring your visual identity to life and captivate your audience
hero.subtitle: Logo & Social Media Design
hero.description: A strong and consistent visual identity is essential to stand out in a saturated digital environment. At Numispark, we design impactful visuals that reflect your brand's essence and capture your target audience's attention.

items.name: Logo Creation & Visual Identity
items.description: Your logo is much more than just a graphic - it's the foundation of your brand identity. Our strategic approach to logo design ensures that every visual element tells your story and communicates your values.
items.conclusion: Our creation process includes an in-depth discovery phase to understand your business, market, and objectives. We then explore multiple creative concepts before developing and perfecting your unique visual identity.

items.name: Social Media Post Design
items.description: Transform your social media presence with professional and consistent visuals that maximize engagement and brand recognition.
expertise: Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and TikTok posts
items.conclusion: Each design is optimized for the technical specifications of each platform while maintaining perfect visual consistency with your brand identity.

items.name: Complete Brand Kits
items.description: Ensure the consistency of your visual communication with a complete brand kit - the essential tool for professional image management.
expertise: Templates for internal and external documents
items.conclusion: Delivered in professional formats (PDF, Figma, Adobe XD), your brand kit allows your entire team to create communications aligned with your visual identity.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: We begin by understanding your business, market, and objectives. This phase includes a detailed questionnaire, competitor analysis, and definition of your visual positioning to ensure that every creative element is strategically aligned with your business ambitions.

steps.title: Research & Concepts
steps.description: We develop multiple creative directions based on your brief. Each concept is designed to reflect your uniqueness and resonate with your target audience. This creative exploration phase allows us to identify the best visual directions before investing in full development.

steps.title: Design & Refinement
steps.description: After concept selection, we refine the design to perfection. You benefit from unlimited revisions to ensure your complete satisfaction. Every detail is carefully crafted to create a visual identity that truly distinguishes you from your competitors.

steps.title: Finalization & Delivery
steps.description: We prepare all files in formats suited to your needs (web, print, social media) and provide you with a complete usage guide. You receive all source files, giving you total flexibility for all your future communication needs.

whyUs.title: Why choose Numispark for your graphic design

reasons.title: Strategic Approach
reasons.description: We don't just create aesthetic designs - we develop visual identities that support your business objectives and strengthen your brand positioning.

reasons.title: Multi-Platform Expertise
reasons.description: Our team masters the technical specifics and trends of each social platform to maximize the impact of your content.

reasons.title: Collaborative Process
reasons.description: We involve you at every stage of the creative process to ensure the final result is perfectly aligned with your vision.

reasons.title: Source Files Included
reasons.description: You receive all source files from your project, giving you total flexibility for the future.

cost.question: How much does logo and visual identity creation cost?
cost.answer: The price varies according to project complexity and desired deliverables. Our packages start from a few hundred euros for a simple logo and can go up to several thousand euros for a complete visual identity with brand kit. Contact us for a free personalized quote.

formats.question: What file formats will I receive for my logo?
formats.answer: You will receive your logo in all necessary formats: vector files (AI, EPS, SVG) for lossless use at any scale, as well as raster formats (PNG, JPG) optimized for web and social media. Editable source files are always included.

timeline.question: How long does it take to create a complete visual identity?
timeline.answer: The average time for a complete visual identity project is 2 to 3 weeks. Creating a logo alone can be done in 1 to 2 weeks. These timelines may vary depending on project complexity and your responsiveness during feedback phases.

monthlyPackages.question: Do you offer monthly packages for social media post design?
monthlyPackages.answer: Yes, we offer monthly packages for regular creation of visual content for your social media. These packages can include a defined number of posts per month, adapted to different platforms, with volume discounts.

collaboration.question: How does collaboration work for design projects?
collaboration.answer: After an in-depth initial brief, we work iteratively by presenting concepts you can comment on. Our collaborative process uses tools like Figma that allow you to visualize progress and provide precise feedback directly on the designs.

ai.question: Do you use artificial intelligence to create your designs?
ai.answer: We use AI as a complementary tool in our creative process, particularly for exploration and inspiration. However, all our designs are created and finalized by our professional designers to guarantee originality, strategic relevance, and impeccable technical quality.

templates.question: Can I edit the post templates you create myself?
templates.answer: Absolutely. We create editable templates on accessible platforms like Canva, or in professional formats like Photoshop or Illustrator according to your preferences. We can also train your team on their use.

satisfaction.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the proposed design?
satisfaction.answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. We offer unlimited revisions until you are fully satisfied with the result. If despite our efforts you are not convinced, we offer a satisfaction or money-back guarantee.
